      • setShapes

        public void setShapes(java.util.ArrayList shapes)
        An array of shapes for the annotation. For options that apply to multiple shapes, then can be added to the [shapeOptions](annotations.shapeOptions.html).

      • getShapes

      • setLabels

        public void setLabels(java.util.ArrayList labels)
        An array of labels for the annotation. For options that apply to multiple labels, they can be added to the [labelOptions](annotations.labelOptions.html).

      • getLabels

        public java.util.ArrayList getLabels()

      • setLabelOptions

        public void setLabelOptions(HILabelOptions labelOptions)
        Options for annotation's labels. Each label inherits options from the labelOptions object. An option from the labelOptions can be overwritten by config for a specific label.

        public void setShapeOptions(HIShapeOptions shapeOptions)
        Options for annotation's shapes. Each shape inherits options from the shapeOptions object. An option from the shapeOptions can be overwritten by config for a specific shape.
